item.title: Private Park City Snowshoe Excursions (9:30am/12:30pm start time)
item.description: Discover the mountains of Park City, Utah in a different way on this guided snowshoe tour. Don your provided snow gear and join a private guide to begin your journey through the snow-covered mountains and valleys. Enjoy picturesque views of the area away from the crowds of skiers and snowboarders and keep your eyes peeled for local wildlife.

image.alt: Private Park City Snowshoe Excursions (9:30am/12:30pm start time)

item.title: Urban Art and Historical E-Bike Tour in Park City
item.description: Discover urban art and learn about the Park City’s history on this small-group guided e-bike tour. Go further with less effort on an electric bike. Follow your guide around past hidden works of art, historical buildings, and more, while hearing interesting stories about the city and different landmarks. Includes pickup.

image.alt: Urban Art and Historical E-Bike Tour in Park City

item.title: Guided Fly Fishing Experience in Park City
item.description: If you’ve ever wanted to learn to fly fishing, then this immersive experience outside of Salt Lake City is right for you. Join a private guide and head out on the water to learn the techniques to cast, catch, and release fish. You also learn about feeding habits, locations, and the ecosystem to gain more insight into the intricacies of fly fishing.

image.alt: Guided Fly Fishing Experience in Park City

item.title: Privately Guided Snowshoe Experience
item.description: Enjoy a snowshoe adventure from Park City with this private guided tour. The trail can be customized to fit your group’s fitness, experience, and interests. All equipment will be provided and your guide will help you gear up and provide handy tips. With a private tour, you can go at your own pace, and soak up the scenery and experience.

image.alt: Privately Guided Snowshoe Experience

item.title: 2 Day Rental of Park City Premium Ski Package
item.description: Maximize your time on the slopes by having your ski gear, boots, and poles delivered right to your door. This Park City ski rental is completely customizable and catered around your schedule, with deliveries and fittings available as early as 7:30am. Allow our professional and knowledgeable staff to get you the right equipment, so you can focus your energy on the mountain—rather than standing in line. Service available in the Park City area up until 10pm.

image.alt: 2 Day Rental of Park City Premium Ski Package

item.title: Slovak Kolaches and Babka Baking Class in Park City
item.description: Dive into this 2-hour journey of mouth-watering Slovakian flavors and uncover the secrets behind traditional family recipes. Hosted by Lenka, a passionate baker and food lover from Slovakia currently living, eating, and baking in Park City, Utah! She learned to cook and bake from her grandmother when she was eight, and still uses her valuable recipes. This 1.5 private, hands-on baking class is sure to take your taste buds on an unforgettable adventure. Learn to bake traditional kolaches (breakfast pastries) and babka (sweet braided bread of Jewish origins) from scratch. Discover the vibrant culture through local dishes as you bake two homemade specialties in Lenka's cozy home kitchen, then savor the result with her..

image.alt: Slovak Kolaches and Babka Baking Class in Park City

item.title: Backcountry snowshoeing in pristine Utah mountains
item.description: Reduced rates on advanced bookings for winter 24/25! We are anticipating A TON of snow this year. Let's get out there! We are still new on this platform and need to earn more raving reviews. We have our rates low just to make sure we get with some great people and get outside. Our snowshoe experience is more rugged and adventurous than other treks on private ranches or hillsides near town. We take you (by permit) into the National Forest to capture amazing scenery and views. We also consider everyone's comfort level and tailor the experience to trails and distances that match your interest and ability. No prior snowshoeing experience is necessary. We got this!

image.alt: Backcountry snowshoeing in pristine Utah mountains

item.title: Park City Prowl Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Get to know Park City by this scavenger hunt, led by a remote live host who will help you along the way with encouragement and hints, if needed. You and your friends are in an alternate reality with this experience, while still learning about all the history, art, and culture of the city by solving clues and gaining points. Up to 10 per group can participate, and it is about a half day excursion.

image.alt: Park City Prowl Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Park City ATV and UTV Rentals (4 Seater RZR)
item.description: Polaris RZR XP 4 1000 Premium side by side, always the current-year model with low miles. They’re the ultimate machines for exploring the diverse, beautiful terrain surrounding Kamas. Your explorations might include climbing mountains, crossing rivers, zooming along trails, navigating switchbacks, and taking in spectacular views the entire time. Keep your eyes peeled for Rocky Mountain elk and mule deer. All RZRs are equipped with Ride Command, a system that will guide you on the trails and back home—no worries about getting lost in the vast Utah landscape! Rent for a full day or just part of the day, whatever is best for your group. The team will be happy to give you loads of recommendations to make the most of your ride and will also mark up hard hard-copy maps with routes and photo-op stops that you can refer to throughout your exploration. Get ready for an unforgettable outdoor experience!

image.alt: Park City ATV and UTV Rentals (4 Seater RZR)

item.title: 2 Day Rental of Park City Basic Ski Rental Package
item.description: We know that every moment here in Park City is precious, which is why it's nice to save the time of waiting in line at the shop. Our knowledgeable outfitters can bring all-mountain skis directly to you at your lodging, and get you fitted with skis that are best for standard technique and performance. Experience the confidence of using gear that's customized just for your style, with boots, poles, and skis that are fitted without ever leaving your door. Gear is available for both men and women, and delivery is available fin the Park City area from 7:30am-10pm.

image.alt: 2 Day Rental of Park City Basic Ski Rental Package

item.title: Hiking and Yoga On Top Of A Mountain in Park City Utah
item.description:
THIS ACTIVITY RUNS FROM APRIL THROUGH OCTOBER - NO AVAILABILITY IN THE WINTER
Have you ever done yoga on top of a mountain? With 360 degree amazing views. This hike and yoga practice is truly Utah Unique.
We will start by meeting at the trial head. From there we hike up a mountain that with every switchback gives you a new amazing view of Park City. The higher we climb the more you can see. The hike lasts for about 30 to 45 minutes. Once we get to the top the 360 degree views of Park City and the surrounding area is breathtaking. We will roll out our yoga mats and enjoy a yoga practice on top of a mountain. Every side of your yoga mat holds a new and spectacular view. This yoga practice is created for all levels of yogi, from beginner to advanced you will get the right practice for you. After our yoga practice we will hike back down to the base of the mountain.
This is a private activity, so you get to enjoy the personalized experience.

image.alt: Hiking and Yoga On Top Of A Mountain in Park City Utah

item.title: 3 Hours Park City Snowmobile Adventure
item.description: Experience the Uinta Mountains where we have a Exclusive guide. Prepare to witness the beauty of Lilly and Lost Lake, Bald Mountain, and Hayden Peak which can only be seen on a snowmobile. The tour will take you through towering pines and see glistening snow-covered terrain. Whether you're a seasoned rider or a first-time rider this is an unforgettable journey. Buckle up where the beauty of nature meets the thrill of the ride.

image.alt: 3 Hours Park City Snowmobile Adventure

item.title: Guided Uinta Forest 3-Mile Hike w/fire + Lunch/charcuterie Stop
item.description: Utah is an expansive destination. That makes finding the right hiking experience difficult sometimes. That's why we provide the best guided hikes in the area. Our 3.5-mile looped hikes feature the best traction equipment, a halfway stop for hot cider, conversation, and pictures. The trails are also looped trails which is particularly difficult to find in the winter months. Hikes are also led by local Utahans so learning the area, food options, and about other experiences to maximize your vacation has never been easier.

image.alt: Guided Uinta Forest 3-Mile Hike w/fire + Lunch/charcuterie Stop

item.title: Private Photo Workshop and Sightseeing in Wasatch Mountains
item.description: Get into the Wasatch Mountains of Utah with this full day photography excursion led by a guide with over 30 years of professional experience in the area. They will take you through the wildflower fields, meadows, to high plateaus and lakes where wildlife reside. You’ll receive instruction, tricks, and techniques on how to capture the images. Take away new skills and some fantastic images.

image.alt: Private Photo Workshop and Sightseeing in Wasatch Mountains

item.title: Day Trip Activity at Utah Mountain Backcountry with Box Lunch
item.description: Fall colors are at their best right now!!! Late September and early October is prime time and the forecast for those weeks looks promising, with sunshine, warm temperatures, and crisp mountain air. Come with us!!! We spend a whole day with you in the mountains. We bring all the gear, knowledge of the terrain, and provide transportation to help you have a memorable and fun filled day exploring what Utah mountains are all about. We operate on a US Forest Service Outfitting & Guiding Permit providing the authorization for us to take you in the Wasatch-Cache-Uinta National Forest. All the details are covered.

image.alt: Day Trip Activity at Utah Mountain Backcountry with Box Lunch

item.title: Private Tour in Heber Valley
item.description: Embark on a journey to an overlook showing the landscape of Heber Valley! Picture this, driving up forest road 309, surrounded by the beauty of nature, for roughly an hour of gentle exploration. Along the way, you'll likely encounter wild animals, adding a touch of excitement to your adventure. As you make your way to the top, a stunning view of the Heber Valley awaits, with Mount Timpanogos towering in the distance. There are no bathrooms along the way, the opportunity to stop, explore on foot, and capture photographs is encouraged. Temperatures drop 10-15 degrees from the valley to the view point. Doors may be on or off and what is outside (usually dust!) might just be on the inside. If it is raining there is a high chance we will get wet and or muddy. Heat is usually not much of an issue but it can get cool especially in the evenings and on a moments notice with a storm rolling through. Highly recommended to book this 1.5 hours before sunset. Snow under 1ft does not usually stop us.

image.alt: Private Tour in Heber Valley

item.title: Park City Puzzling Adventure
item.description: Discover the sights of Park City on a self-guided puzzle adventure. Begin your offbeat tour experience at the time of your choosing. Similar to an escape room, your group of friends must work together to solve a number of clues that lead you through the city’s top neighborhoods. All you need is a smartphone to download the tour. Pause the timer whenever you like to appreciate the sights or stop for a break.

image.alt: Park City Puzzling Adventure

item.title: Snowga - Snowshoe and Yoga in Park City's Winter Wonderland
item.description:
This is truly a unique activity to Utah. Surrounded by Utah's magical winter wonderland and doing yoga on top of a mountain. You will soak in amazing mountain top views and try a new activity of yoga in the snow. This will be your most memorable Utah experience.
We start meeting at our set location. From there we snowshoe through snowy mountain setting to the top of Empire Pass. The views are spectacular! We will roll out our yoga mats and pour ourselves some hot beverages. From here we will start our Snowga, yoga in the snow. What is truly magical about this experience is the silence all around us. The snow muffles the sound. As you move through various yoga poses you get to experience the wonders of nature all around you. After yoga we will snowshoe back to the parking lot.

image.alt: Snowga - Snowshoe and Yoga in Park City's Winter Wonderland

item.title: Park City Snowshoe
item.description: This tour is a unique opportunity to experience a locals secret escape for activity throughout the year free from the throngs of tourists, noisy highways and housing developments. With beautiful views of the Wasatch Mountains it is a perfect mix of wild nature but wide and accessible terrain for both adventure seekers and families seeking to explore. Our friendly local guides will share information about the history of Park City, it's current state and interesting local information about Sundance Film Festival, Economic Status and Olympic past and future. A perfect locals experience for your trip to Park City Utah.

image.alt: Park City Snowshoe

item.title: Private Photo Workshop and Sightseeing in Wasatch Mountains
item.description: Be guided by a Utah local and an expert photographer through the Wasatch Mountains as you spend the day taking photographs and sightseeing around this beautiful natural landscape. This is about a half day experience, which can be catered to your fitness level, and interests. Your instructor will show you tricks on composition, techniques, and camera settings, and give you time to explore by yourself.

image.alt: Private Photo Workshop and Sightseeing in Wasatch Mountains

item.title: Intermediate Ski Rental Package for Park City
item.description: Hit the slopes with this Preferred Ski Package! Rental period is 24 hours, leaving you plenty of time to enjoy the snow and maximize your skills.

image.alt: Intermediate Ski Rental Package for Park City

item.title: Park City Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Ride
item.description:
Fulfill your bucket list with a true one-of-a-kind experience. Our flight team launches spectacular sunrise flights every day (weather permitting) June - September, lifting into the air just after the sun comes up.
Bring your family and friends, and don't forget your camera; you'll want to share your pictures with everyone!
Important Note- The flight itself is roughly 45 minutes to one hour. The entire experience is roughly 3-4 hours due to driving to/from our launch and landing locations, as well as the set up and take down of the balloon.

image.alt: Park City Sunrise Hot Air Balloon Ride

item.title: Junior Snowboard Rental Package for Park City
item.description: Skip the hassle of waiting in line for junior snowboarding equipment during your holiday in Park City. This prepaid rental package allows for easy pickup the evening before a day on the slopes. With a 24-hour rental period, young ones of any skill level will have plenty of time to enjoy the snow. The snowboard package includes boots and bindings.

image.alt: Junior Snowboard Rental Package for Park City

item.title: Junior Ski Rental Package for Park City
item.description: This Junior Ski Package is perfect for young skiers of all abilities. The rental period is 24 hours, leaving you plenty of time to enjoy making turns. Juniors must be size 6 shoe and under, under 100 lbs, and less than 5' tall, regardless of age

image.alt: Junior Ski Rental Package for Park City
